page.title: 14FISHING FOR FUN
page.content: MANSFIELD HAS VARIOUS PLACES FOR {LEISURE FISHING.}MANSFIELD DAM IS ON QUARRY LANE AND IT COSTS 50p.FOR ADULTS TO FISH AND 25p.FOR SENIOR CITIZENS AND CHILDREN.TO FISH THERE YOU CAN ALSO BUY AN AA. BOOKLET,THIS ENABLES YOU TO FISH IN THE MANSFIELD DAM,PART OF THE RIVER TRENT AND ALSO TIBSHELF.MANSFIELD ALSO HAS A RESERVOIR NEAR,AROUND THIS YOU CAN TAKE A STROLL AND FEED THE DUCKS. ON THE RESERVOIR THERE IS A SAILING CLUB.AT THE CLUB THERE ARE TOPPERS, CANOES AND SOME LARGE SPEED BOATS. ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE ROAD IS KING'S MILL HOSPITAL.
